message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for both of us, considering its worth to you and my cost to provide it. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your cost to provide it. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a deal if you're willing to come down to $130.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After considering our positions, I am willing to accept $135 for the product. I believe this price respects the value it holds for both of us and moves us closer to reaching an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. I'd like to make another counteroffer. How about $132? I'm willing to meet you halfway again and make a deal if you're willing to come down to $132.
